lead_paragraph: The department opened an investigation into an officer’s shooting of Mr. Crutcher, an unarmed black man who appeared to be raising his hands above his head.

headline.print_headline: Video Shown After Officer Kills a Black Man in Tulsa
headline.main: Video Released in Terence Crutcher’s Killing by Tulsa Police

snippet: The department opened an investigation into an officer’s shooting of Mr. Crutcher, an unarmed black man who appeared to be raising his hands above his head....
abstract: Tulsa, Okla, police release video of encounter in which white police officer Betty Shelby fatally shot unarmed black man Terence Crutcher; video shows him raising his hands over his head.
